content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetCertificates path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ssl/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/certificates content: params
name stackid
in path
required true
desc a stack id or slug
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all certificates
responses
200
certificategetcertificatesresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
certificatecertificate
type obj
props
stackid
type str
desc the certificates associated stack id
id
type str
desc the certificates id
hosts
type str
desc a list of certificate san hosts
issuer
type str
desc the authority who issued the certificate
certificate
type str
desc the certificates pem pkcs #7 formatted contents
cabundle
type str
desc a pem pkcs #7 formatted certificate authority bundle
certificatecertificatestatus
type str
default unknown
desc a ssl certificate status

 unknown the status is currently unknown
  pending the certificate is currently pending issuance
  complete the certificate has been issued and can be downloaded
  expired the certificate expriation date has passed
  failed an error has prevented the certificate from being issued
  pendingverification the certificate has begun processing and is currently waiting for host verification to complete
  revoked the certificate was revoked with the ssl provider
  ready the certificate has been issued but has not been downloaded yet not currenly in use
  replaced the certificate has been replaced by either a host update or a renewal
expiresat
type str
format datetime
desc the date the certificate will expire and the status updated to expired
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date the certificate was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time a certificate was updated by the provisioning process
certificatecertificatestatusdetails
type obj
verificationfailures
type arr
certificatecertificateverificationfailure
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc the host the verification failed on
details
type str
desc detailed information about the failure
checkedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time the failure was detected
desc a record that indicates why a domain is failing ssl validation
desc failures preventing the certificate from being issued
desc detailed certificate status
desc an ssl certificate
title: 6_Certificates_GetCertificates_29.json
